org.apache.hadoop.registry.client.impl.zk

Class ZKPathDumper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.registry.client.impl.zk.ZKPathDumper

  • public class ZKPathDumper
extends Object
    This class dumps a registry tree to a string. It does this in the toString() method, so it can be used in a log statement -the operation will only take place if the method is evaluated.

      Create a path dumper -but do not dump the path until asked
